Freezy-0.0.7: A simple interpreted programming language implemented in Haskell.

MAIN

entry :: IO () #

The command line entry point

dispatch :: [String] -> IO () #

the arg dispatcher

version :: IO () #

print the version

usage :: IO () #

print version and usage

REPL

replEntry :: IO () #

prints a welcome message and enters the repl

repl :: IO () #

a repl for Freezy using readline

execFile

execFile :: String -> IO () #

read a Freezy source file and execute it

Backend

runSource :: String -> IO () #

interpret a given source string. This is the backend for both the repl and for execFile
